extendedInfo.description: Another cool app by The Screaming App Guy!This time it is an app that could make things finally go your way! That is right, it is a good luck charm whenever you need one. Just choose the charm that best fits the situation and watch things go your way! With several charms to choose from, you're sure to have the right one when you need it! Going to the casino? Make sure you take along your good luck charm! Got a tough test in History tomorrow? Better take along a good luck charm to ensure you do well!This is for entertainment purposes only.

reviews.title: 4 pics. That\'s all. Airpush ads.
reviews.comment: Nice try but this app isn\'t very interesting.
reviews.author: Ann Greenfield
